name: Checker youtube videos
author: Egor Petrov

sections.description: This plugin finds youtube video ids in posts, pages and WooCommerce products and send request to youtube API that check – does this videos still available. If video became unavailable, plugin show notifications about that.
sections.installation:
1. Install plugin from plugin page
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Added this readme file

1.0.2

  • Fixed problems with pagination and tables rows styles
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install plugin from plugin page
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
